text: Constance D'Arcy Mackay (1887 – 21 August 1966) was an American author and playwright. She was a charter member of PEN International and authored over sixty plays in her time. ==References== ==External links== * Constance D'Arcy MacKay papers, 1915-1939, held by the Billy Rose Theatre Division, New York Public Library for the Performing Arts * * Category:1966 deaths Category:1887 births Category:Date of birth unknown Category:American women dramatists and playwrights Category:Place of birth missing Category:Place of death missing Category:International PEN
title: Constance D'Arcy Mackay
